name: TIL DARK
description:
• WASD to move.
  • P to pause/resume.
  • Left click to shoot and interact with UI.
  • ESC to show mouse mid-game.
  • SPACE to jump.

Let's see for how long can you stay alive!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

MAIN CONCEPT

  • ONLY ONE SCENARIO (FEELSBADMAN)
  • KILL EVERYTHING YOU CAN FOR AS LONG AS YOU STAY ALIVE
  • “TERROR MOOD”
  • FOCUS ON PLAYER FEEDBACK

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

IMPLEMENTATION HIGHLIGHTS LIST

  • ENEMIES CAN DROP INSTANT CONSUMABLES
  • ENEMIES RANDOMLY SPAWN ON THE SCENE
  • THUNDER AND LIGHT SIMULATION THRU VISUAL AND SOUND EFFECTS
  • RANDOM ENVIRONMENTAL SOUNDS ON THE SCENE
  • DIMINISHING POINT LIGHT ON PLAYER OVER GAMEPLAY TIME
  • LOOT: HEALING AND VISION-RECOVERING ORBS

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SCENARIO VIEW

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

GETTING THE MOOD RIGHT

  • PROPER BACKGROUND MUSIC
  • SCARY SOUND EFFECTS
  • GAME MECHANICS AROUND IT
  • GAME LIGHTNING AROUND IT

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

EFECTS = MECHANICS

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

MEANS TO AN END...

  • EASY TO KILL ENEMIES WITH AN EVER INCREASING SPAWN RATE TIME
  • HEALS ON ME!
  • OUR GUIDING LIGHT GETS SMALLER DURING TIME BUT WE CAN KEEP IT ON BY LOOTING VISION ORBS.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

LOOTABLE ORB SYSTEM

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONCLUSION

  • NOT EASY TO KEEP A PRETTY AND OPTIMIZED CODE GOING
  • PRIVATE OVER PUBLIC WHENEVER POSSIBLE
  • AUDIO SHENANIGANS ARE HARD
  • FUN THO!
